## Description

This is the repo to compute regression model with heteroscedastic error.

## The Model

$$
  y(x)=g^\top(x) \beta + \frac{e}{\sqrt{\lambda(x)}} = \sum_{i=1}^p g_i(x) \beta_i + \frac{e}{\sqrt{\lambda(x) }},\quad e\sim \N(0,\sigma).
$$

### Polynomial model

Here \(g(x) = (1,x,\dots,x^d\)\), \(\beta^\top=(\beta_0,\dots,\beta_d)\) and $e(x)$ is a random error having mean 0 and constant variance $\sigma^2$. The function $\lambda(x)$ is a known positive real-valued continuous function on $\X$ and inversely proportional to the variance of the fitted response at $x$.
